titles.title: National Women's Business Council Reauthorization Act of 1993
A bill to reauthorize the National Women's Business Council, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S8825-8826)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary: 7/15/1993--Introduced. National Women's Business Council Reauthorization Act of 1993 - Amends the Women's Business Ownership Act of 1988 to: (1) increase from nine to 11 the authorized number of members on the National Women's Business Council; (2) require one such member to be appointed by the President; and (3) authorize appropriations for FY 1994 and 1995 for Council purposes.
